game.name: Wild Hunter Sniper Buck
game.description:
You have suddenly reached out to an African jungle where lots of deers and other wild animals exist. The best thing is that you are not alone, but your favourite gun is there to assist you. Choose any of the multiple weapons and go for the most amazing hunting experience in Wild Hunter Sniper Buck! There are multiple powerful pistols and guns to explore in this brand new action-packed challenge. You would have multiple shooting ranges to use in multiple levels.

Grab your gun and start deer hunting in a completely exclusive yet friendly environment! Take your time before shooting as the sound of a bullet can make a noise in the forest and all your hunts could run away and they will soon be disappeared from the screen. Hurry up friends since you have only a limited time to achieve your mission in each level. Use your mouse or tap the screen of your mobile phone to shoot, R for reloading your gun, and E for turning night vision.

There are different types of animals like pigs, wolves, rabbit, deer and more in this forest to hunt. And your every hunting rewards you with some money. Keep hunting and earning to unlock new levels and weapons in this HTML5 shooter challenge! Get your perfect shots before the time expires in all 12 action-packed 3D levels! Yes, it requires putting your snipper and shooting skills to test to win all the levels. We are pretty sure that your sniper gun will help you to make your hunting against the beasts successful. Good luck completing your missions through all the levels!
